column12: Really boring class especially at 8am, which is the only time it was offered. Class in general is very easy. Learn Creo and Apriori and you will be completely fine for the labs and the project.

ME 170 is extremely easy.  There are in class assignments that are guaranteed 100% if you are in class, no tests, and the rest of the class is a lab.  In the lab you follow the book step by step.  The last four or so weeks of the semester are a group design project.  Lectures are somewhat dry but you have to tough it out for the assignment credit.
